converter.viewDescription: Select a view to filter data scope. Conversion will only be performed on records in the selected view
converter.urlFieldDescription: Select text fields that contain links. The plugin will scan these fields for URLs
converter.noTextFields: No text fields found. Please create text fields to store links
converter.attachmentFieldDescription: Select the field where converted attachments will be stored
converter.createFieldHint: You can create a new field to store attachments
converter.selectedAttachmentFieldDescription: Converted files will be uploaded to this field
converter.allowAllFileTypesWarning: Warning: Allowing all file types may pose security risks. Please ensure you trust the link sources
converter.preserveOriginalLinkDescription: Save the original URL as attachment comment
converter.conversionSuccessDescription: Successfully converted {successful} files, processed {total} links in total
converter.conversionErrorDescription: An error occurred during conversion. Please check network connection and permissions
converter.conversionErrorHint: Errors occurred during conversion. Processed files will be preserved
converter.pleaseSelectFields: Please select view, URL field and attachment field
converter.selectViewUrlAndAttachmentFields: Please select view, URL field and attachment field
converter.noRecordsInView: No records in current view or table
